Title: BERNEY Swiss Gold Overlay Locket Watch Pendant
Description: BERNEY Swiss Gold Overlay Locket Watch Pendant Swedemom is proud to present this Gold Overlay, Locket Watch Pendant from Berney of Switzerland. One of the premier Swiss watch making families, BERNEY has been manufacturing timepieces of exceptional quality for many years. These exquisite pieces (CASES and MOVEMENTS) are manufactured and assembled entirely at the factory in La Vallee' de Joux in Switzerland. The round white 18mm dial (face) is signed "Berney", "Quartz" and "Swiss Made." It has black Roman numerals and black hour and minute hands. The 25mm case is engraved on both sides with a floral design. This Brand New, Battery Operated locket watch pendant is heirloom quality. Charity.Mission: MacHub is a division of Yamhill County Gospel Rescue Mission. MacHub partners with YCGRM to provide needed shelter, support, hope, and job opportunities. MacHub is changing community fund-raising by facilitating the sale of high-value contributions and passing proceeds on to nonprofits in the community. We thank our supporters and we welcome your ongoing support of our efforts!
